var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "div",
    [
      _c("SideBar"),
      _c(
        "v-row",
        [
          _c("v-spacer"),
          _c(
            "v-col",
            { staticClass: "mt-4", attrs: { cols: "12", md: "5" } },
            [
              _c(
                "v-card",
                { attrs: { elevation: "2" } },
                [
                  _c(
                    "v-container",
                    [
                      _c("strong", { staticClass: "ml-3" }, [
                        _vm._v(
                          "Bills For " +
                            _vm._s(_vm.order.orderTable.tableName) +
                            " Order Id : " +
                            _vm._s(_vm.order.orderId)
                        ),
                      ]),
                      _vm._l(_vm.order.orderItems, function (item) {
                        return _c(
                          "v-list",
                          {
                            key: item.orderItemId,
                            staticClass: "mt-1",
                            attrs: { subheader: "", "two-line": "" },
                          },
                          [
                            _c(
                              "v-list-item",
                              [
                                _c(
                                  "v-list-item-avatar",
                                  {
                                    attrs: {
                                      rounded: "",
                                      color: "grey lighten-4",
                                    },
                                  },
                                  [
                                    _c("v-img", {
                                      attrs: {
                                        src:
                                          _vm.localDomain + item.food.foodPhoto,
                                      },
                                    }),
                                  ],
                                  1
                                ),
                                _c(
                                  "v-list-item-content",
                                  [
                                    _c(
                                      "v-list-item-title",
                                      { staticClass: "subtitle-2" },
                                      [_vm._v(_vm._s(item.food.foodName))]
                                    ),
                                    _c("v-list-item-subtitle", [
                                      _vm._v(
                                        " " + _vm._s(item.quantity) + " X "
                                      ),
                                      _c("strong", [
                                        _vm._v(
                                          _vm._s(item.food.foodPrice) + " Ks"
                                        ),
                                      ]),
                                    ]),
                                  ],
                                  1
                                ),
                                _c(
                                  "v-list-item-action",
                                  { staticClass: "caption" },
                                  [
                                    _vm._v(
                                      _vm._s(
                                        item.quantity * item.food.foodPrice
                                      ) + "Ks "
                                    ),
                                  ]
                                ),
                              ],
                              1
                            ),
                          ],
                          1
                        )
                      }),
                      _c("v-divider", { staticClass: "mx-4" }),
                      _c(
                        "v-toolbar",
                        { attrs: { flat: "" } },
                        [
                          _c("strong", [_vm._v("Total:")]),
                          _c("v-spacer"),
                          _c("strong", [
                            _vm._v(_vm._s(_vm.order.orderTotal) + "Ks"),
                          ]),
                        ],
                        1
                      ),
                      _c("strong", { staticClass: "ml-5" }, [
                        _vm._v("Payment Method"),
                      ]),
                      _c(
                        "v-item-group",
                        { staticClass: "mt-n1", attrs: { mandatory: "" } },
                        [
                          _c(
                            "v-container",
                            [
                              _c(
                                "v-row",
                                { attrs: { justify: "center" } },
                                [
                                  _c(
                                    "v-col",
                                    { attrs: { cols: "12", md: "4" } },
                                    [
                                      _c("v-item", {
                                        scopedSlots: _vm._u([
                                          {
                                            key: "default",
                                            fn: function ({ active, toggle }) {
                                              return [
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-card",
                                                  {
                                                    staticClass:
                                                      "d-flex align-center rounded-lg",
                                                    class: active
                                                      ? "borderme"
                                                      : "",
                                                    attrs: {
                                                      color: "#F6EFEF",
                                                      dark: "",
                                                      height: "70",
                                                      flat: "",
                                                    },
                                                    on: { click: toggle },
                                                  },
                                                  [
                                                    _c(
                                                      "v-row",
                                                      [
                                                        _c(
                                                          "v-col",
                                                          {
                                                            attrs: {
                                                              cols: "12",
                                                              md: "12",
                                                            },
                                                          },
                                                          [
                                                            _c(
                                                              "v-list-item",
                                                              {
                                                                staticClass:
                                                                  "text-center mt-1",
                                                                attrs: {
                                                                  "three-line":
                                                                    "",
                                                                },
                                                              },
                                                              [
                                                                _c(
                                                                  "v-list-item-content",
                                                                  [
                                                                    _c(
                                                                      "div",
                                                                      [
                                                                        _c(
                                                                          "v-icon",
                                                                          {
                                                                            attrs:
                                                                              {
                                                                                color:
                                                                                  active
                                                                                    ? "#704232"
                                                                                    : "black",
                                                                              },
                                                                          },
                                                                          [
                                                                            _vm._v(
                                                                              "fas fa-money-bill-wave"
                                                                            ),
                                                                          ]
                                                                        ),
                                                                      ],
                                                                      1
                                                                    ),
                                                                    _c(
                                                                      "v-list-item-subtitle",
                                                                      {
                                                                        staticClass:
                                                                          "mt-n2 caption",
                                                                        class:
                                                                          active
                                                                            ? "brown--text"
                                                                            : "black--text",
                                                                      },
                                                                      [
                                                                        _vm._v(
                                                                          "Cash"
                                                                        ),
                                                                      ]
                                                                    ),
                                                                  ],
                                                                  1
                                                                ),
                                                              ],
                                                              1
                                                            ),
                                                          ],
                                                          1
                                                        ),
                                                      ],
                                                      1
                                                    ),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                              ]
                                            },
                                          },
                                        ]),
                                      }),
                                    ],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                ],
                                1
                              ),
                            ],
                            1
                          ),
                        ],
                        1
                      ),
                    ],
                    2
                  ),
                ],
                1
              ),
            ],
            1
          ),
          _c("v-spacer"),
        ],
        1
      ),
    ],
    1
  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
